Table of Contents

NAME

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

terminates a process. Before termination it performs the following functions in the order listed: Call the functions registered with the function, in the reverse order of their registration. Flush all open output streams. Close all open streams. Unlink all files created with the function.

RETURN VALUES

The function never returns.

SEE ALSO

STANDARDS

The function conforms to
